The timeoutMillis parameter indicates how long the request will be queued for in case the SDK is not connected to the GameSparks service. member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if a new player would have been registered, rather than creating the player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.AmazonConnectRequest.SetDoNotLinkToCurrentPlayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should not try to link the external profile with the current player. If false, links the external profile to the currently signed in player. If true, creates a new player and links the external profile to them. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.AmazonConnectRequest.SetErrorOnSwitch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if an account switch would have occurred, rather than switching automatically. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.AmazonConnectRequest.SetSegments(GameSparks.Core.GSRequestData)
member.summary: An optional segment configuration for this request. If this request creates a new player on the gamesparks platform, the segments of the new player will match the values provided

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.AmazonConnectRequest.SetSwitchIfPossible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should switch to the supplied profile if it isalready associated to a player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.AmazonConnectRequest.SetSyncDisplayName(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the associated players displayName should be kept in syn with this profile when it's updated by the external provider.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetAccessToken(System.String)
member.summary: The access token is used by the client to make authenticated requests on behalf of the end user. It has a longer lifetime than the authorization code, typically on the order of minutes or hours. When the access token expires, attempts to use it will fail, and a new access token must be obtained via a refresh token.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetCode(System.String)
member.summary: An authorization code is a short-lived token representing the user's access grant, created by the authorization server and passed to the client application via the browser. The client application sends the authorization code to the authorization server to obtain an access token and, optionally, a refresh token.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetDoNotCreateNewPlayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if a new player would have been registered, rather than creating the player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetDoNotLinkToCurrentPlayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should not try to link the external profile with the current player. If false, links the external profile to the currently signed in player. If true, creates a new player and links the external profile to them. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetErrorOnSwitch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if an account switch would have occurred, rather than switching automatically. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetSegments(GameSparks.Core.GSRequestData)
member.summary: An optional segment configuration for this request. If this request creates a new player on the gamesparks platform, the segments of the new player will match the values provided

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetSwitchIfPossible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should switch to the supplied profile if it isalready associated to a player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.FacebookConnectRequest.SetSyncDisplayName(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the associated players displayName should be kept in syn with this profile when it's updated by the external provider.

member.summary: The access token is used when using the service id and certificate.

member.summary: The access code is used by the client to make authenticated requests on behalf of the end user. Requires clientId and clientsecret to be set

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetDisplayName(System.String)
member.summary: The display of the current player from Google Play. This will be used as the displayName of the gamesparks player if created (or syncDisplayname is true)

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetDoNotCreateNewPlayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if a new player would have been registered, rather than creating the player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetDoNotLinkToCurrentPlayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should not try to link the external profile with the current player. If false, links the external profile to the currently signed in player. If true, creates a new player and links the external profile to them. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetErrorOnSwitch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if an account switch would have occurred, rather than switching automatically. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetGooglePlusScope(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Did you request the plus.login scope when you got the access code or authorisation token from Google? If this is true, we will fetch the user's google+ account and friends

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetProfileScope(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Did you request the profile scope when you got the access code or authorisation token from Google? If this is true, we will fetch the user info by calling https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v1/userinfo?alt=json

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetRedirectUri(System.String)
member.summary: Only required when the access code has been granted using an explicit redirectUri, for example when using the mechanism described in https://developers.google.com/+/web/signin/server-side-flow

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetSegments(GameSparks.Core.GSRequestData)
member.summary: An optional segment configuration for this request. If this request creates a new player on the gamesparks platform, the segments of the new player will match the values provided

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetSwitchIfPossible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should switch to the supplied profile if it isalready associated to a player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.GooglePlayConnectRequest.SetSyncDisplayName(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the associated players displayName should be kept in syn with this profile when it's updated by the external provider.

member.summary: Indicates that the server should not try to link the external profile with the current player. If false, links the external profile to the currently signed in player. If true, creates a new player and links the external profile to them. Defaults to false.

member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if an account switch would have occurred, rather than switching automatically. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.SteamConnectRequest.SetErrorOnSwitch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the server should return an error if an account switch would have occurred, rather than switching automatically. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.SteamConnectRequest.SetSegments(GameSparks.Core.GSRequestData)
member.summary: An optional segment configuration for this request. If this request creates a new player on the gamesparks platform, the segments of the new player will match the values provided

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.SteamConnectRequest.SetSessionTicket(System.String)

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.SteamConnectRequest.SetSwitchIfPossible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the server should switch to the supplied profile if it isalready associated to a player. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:GameSparks.Api.Requests.SteamConnectRequest.SetSyncDisplayName(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates that the associated players displayName should be kept in syn with this profile when it's updated by the external provider.
